name: Plane plane fights
description:
[March 2020]
This is the first game I ever made and I have improved a lot since then but I still want to publish it. 
It was made in two weeks.

You control a plane and you have to defeat all the enemies that are coming towards you to complete a level. It is really short since the game consists only of 2 levels and there are a lot of bugs.

WASD - control your plane

Space - fire
